price: 56. Ya sólo, Allah na ba anzelu naye basambelaka тропа ntoma(1) Oh! Bino baye bondima, bosambela тропа ye mpe bopesa mbote ya boboto.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتَهُۥ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّۚ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ صَلُّواْ عَلَيۡهِ وَسَلِّمُواْ تَسۡلِيمًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha wamalāikatahu yuṣallūna ʿalā al-nabiyi yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ṣallū ʿalayhi wasallimū taslīman
